title: App crashes on iPad after clicking on a new group chat message in Chats tab
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: App crashes after clicking on a new group chat message in chat list (Chats tab). User is logged out. After logging in again the group chat does not contain the new message badge / indicator and can be successfully opened. Also, the app does not crash when a group message is received while being in the group chat screen.
The issue occurs on iPad Mini ([iPad2,5](https://everymac.com/ultimate-mac-lookup/?search_keywords=iPad2,5)), iOS 9.3.5. I could not reproduce it on a different iOS device I used for testing (iPhone 6, iOS 11.2.1). 

#### Expected behavior
New group chat message can be opened and seen.

#### Actual behavior
App crashes when clicking on the message.

### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status on iPad and iPhone
- Create a group chat (can be done on either of the devices)
- iPad: go to Chats tab to see all chats
- iPhone: send a group message
- iPad: wait until the message is received and click on the group chat to see it

### Additional Information
* Status version: 0.9.12 (TestFlight)
* Operating System: iOS 9.3.5
* Device: iPad Mini ([iPad2,5](https://everymac.com/ultimate-mac-lookup/?search_keywords=iPad2,5))
* Can reproduce 6/6 times
* Works on iPhone 6, iOS 11.2.1
* Issue does not occur for 1-1 chat

#### Logs
[StatusIm-2018-01-07-204908.ips.beta.txt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/1610174/StatusIm-2018-01-07-204908.ips.beta.txt)
